page.title: 10IN THE HOME-BECKLEY & HORTON
page.content:
Domestic appliances and other items found in our homes in 1985.
Vacuum Cleaner 100% Petrol Mower 79% Electric Iron 100% Dishwasher 43% Television 98% Electric Mower 31% Refridgerator 98% Video Recorder 31% Washing Machine 94% Microcomputer 26% Food Mixer 91% Microwave Oven 24% Electric Cooker 91% Cultivator 22% Freezer 89% Floor Polisher 20% Record Player 87% Cooker-Aga/Rayburn Electric Drill 87% (coal/wood) 16% Electric Hairdrier 87% Cooker-propane Cassette Tape recorder 83% 11%
